Package com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger

Package enabling the part-of-speech tagging of a TokenSequence.
The central class is the PosTagger.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    NonDeterministicPosTagger
    A non-deterministic pos tagger, which analyses multiple tokenising possibilities for this sentence, and returns multiple postagging possibilities.
    PosTagAnnotatedCorpusReader
    An interface for reading tokenized and tagged sentences from a corpus.
    PosTagger
    The PosTagger's task is to add part-of-speech tags to words within a sentence.
    PosTaggerContext
    The PosTagger's current context, including the history of decisions taken by the POS tagger so far.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ForwardStatisticalPosTagger
    Performs part-of-speech tagging by applying a beam search to statistical model results.
    PosTag
    A part of speech tag, representing a certain morpho-syntaxic category for a word.
    PosTagEventStream
    A corpus event stream for postagging.
    PosTaggedToken
    A token with a postag tagged onto it.
    Note: this class naturally implements PosTaggerContext since if a token has already been pos-tagged, the once before it have been pos-tagged as well.
    PosTaggedTokenLeftToRightComparator
    Compares PosTaggedTokens, ordering them from left-to-right within a sentence.
    PosTaggerContextImpl  
    PosTaggers
    A factory class for getting a pos-tagger from the configuration.
    PosTaggerTrainer
    Reads various configuration parameters and enables building a pos-tagger model.
    PosTagRegexBasedCorpusReader
    A corpus reader that expects one pos-tagged token per line, and analyses the line content based on a regex supplied during construction, via a CorpusLineReader.
    The following placeholders are required:
    CorpusLine.CorpusElement.TOKEN, CorpusLine.CorpusElement.POSTAG.
    PosTagSequence
    A sequence of postags applied to a given token sequence.
    PosTagSet
    A tag set to be used for pos tagging.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    PosTagOpenClassIndicator
    An enum to indicate whether a PosTag is an open class, a closed class, or an open class which only accepts entries outside of the lexicon.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    UnknownPosTagException
    Thrown when the posTag requested does not exist in this pos tag set.

Package com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger Description

Package enabling the part-of-speech tagging of a TokenSequence.
The central class is the PosTagger.
It tags based on a previously constructed classification model, converting the model's outcomes to PosTag using the currently set PosTagSet.
The PosTagSet loaded from the model if a model already exists, otherwise from the configuration.
The pos-tagger produces a PosTagSequence which is a list of PosTaggedToken.
It can be evaluated via a PosTaggerEvaluator.
